title: Restore locked Pixel 2, don't have password, isn't listed in My Devices, error when factory reset?!
content:
Hello everyone,

I am currently trying to restore my phone, but its in a different country and my mom is trying to help. 
I don't remember the password becuaee it's an old phone. 
My mom tried to factory reset it but the phone came up with an error, see attached photo. 
What's worse, I don't see it listed in my devices, so I cannot remotely erase it!! Any ideas?
